colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @188A *, ,(CES RGYAL BA'I GSUNG RAB THAMS CAD KYI GNAD BSDUS PA, SHING RTA CHEN PO KLU SGRUB DANG THOGS MED GNYIS KYIS LAM SROL, ,RNAM PA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I SAR BGROD PA'I SKYE BO MCHOG GI CHOS LUGS, ,SKYES BU GSUM GYI NYAMS SU BLANG BA'I RIM PA THAMS CAD TSANG BAR STON PA'I BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA DGON PO NAS SNE'U ZUR BA LA BRGYUD PA DANG, SPYAN SNGA BA NAS BRGYUD PA GNYIS DANG, PO TO PA NAS SHAR BA LA BRGYUD PA DANG, PO TO BA NAS DOL BA LA BRGYUR BA'I GDAMS NGAG THOS PA RNAMS KYI DON, LAM RIM RGYAS PA LAS SLAR YANG BSDUS PA 'DI NI, MANG DU THOS PA'I DGE SLONG SPONG BA PA SHAR BTZONG KHA PA BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I DPAL GYIS RI BO DGE LDAN DU SBYAR BA'O, ,)
